AskHowManyWins.say: How many times do I have to beat you in rock paper scissors to be the ultimate winner?

AskUserChoice.say: I made my choice already, what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?
AskUserChoice.reprompt: what's your choice? rock, paper or scissors?

TiedResult.say: Oh! we tied on this one. Great minds think alike, they say. I'll beat you in the next round.

UserWins.say: Oh, you won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

AlexaWins.say: I won this point! You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

UserWinsTheGame.say: You won the game! congratulations, it was a great match.

Bye.say: That's all right, until next time!

AskSayScoreIntent.say: You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

thereisscore.say: You have {userWins} wins and I have {alexaWins} wins.

alexaIsWinnigWithOne.say: The score right now is: Alexa one, you zero. Are you sure you want to start a new game?

numberBiggerToPlay.say: {howManyTimesToWin} is a big number, are you sure you want to play until one of us wins {howManyTimesToWin} times?

help.say: This is the classic rock paper scissors. You have following options set amount of beat by saying, set rock paper scissors by saying, start a new game by saying, check the score by saying

fallback.say: I'm sorry, I didn't understand what you said. You have following options set amount of beat by saying, set rock paper scissors by saying, start a new game by saying, check the score by saying
